attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this country we see far to much of our taxes going overseas. We feel it is time to put Britain first. We have people suffering in this country and get little if any help from the government. Yet we send millions to the third world all we are doing is throwing good money after bad.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
